analytic.title: Joseph II, Chaldean Patriarch in Diyarbakir and the Intellectual Orientations of His Community at the End of the 17th and the Beginnings of the 18th Century

monogr.title: Osmanlı’dan Cumhuriyet’e Diyarbakır / Diyarbakır in the Ottoman Era

body.bibl: Teule, Herman G. B. “Joseph II, Chaldean Patriarch in Diyarbakir and the Intellectual Orientations of His Community at the End of the 17th and the Beginnings of the 18th Century.” In Osmanlı’dan Cumhuriyet’e Diyarbakır / Diyarbakır in the Ottoman Era, edited by Bahaeddin Yediyildiz and Kerstin Tomenendal, 1:677–86. Ankara: Türk Kültürünü Araştırma Enstitüsü, 2008.

Herman G. B. Teule, Joseph II, Chaldean Patriarch in Diyarbakir and the Intellectual Orientations of His Community at the End of the 17th and the Beginnings of the 18th Century, in Osmanlı’dan Cumhuriyet’e Diyarbakır / Diyarbakır in the Ottoman Era, ed. Bahaeddin Yediyildiz and Kerstin Tomenendal, vol. 1 (Ankara: Türk Kültürünü Araştırma Enstitüsü, 2008), 677–86.
